title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 68 - ENGINEERING, LAND SURVEYING AND GEOLOGY
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 68 - ENGINEERING, LAND SURVEYING AND GEOLOGY
State Regulations
§ 68.1 - Professional study and experience requirements for professional engineering
§ 68.2 - Experience acceptable for licensure as a professional engineer
§ 68.3 - Licensing examinations for engineering
§ 68.4 - Professional study of land surveying
§ 68.5 - Experience acceptable for licensure as a land surveyor
§ 68.6 - Licensing examinations for land surveying
§ 68.7 - Professional study for professional geologists
§ 68.8 - Experience acceptable for licensure as a professional geologist
§ 68.9 - Licensing examinations for geology
§ 68.10 - Licensure by endorsement of out-of-state examination
§ 68.11 - Limited permits
§ 68.12 - Scope of practice by exempt persons
§ 68.13 - Seals
§ 68.14 - Continuing education for professional engineers, land surveyors and professional geologists
§ 68.15 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 68

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 212, 6502, 6504, 6506, 6507, 6508, 6509, 7206, 7206-a, 7211, 7212; L. 2002, chs. 135, 146; L. 2003, ch 410

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
